models.moves

Class TrickyMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.moves.Move
      • models.moves.TrickyMove
  • Deprecated. 
    Non implemented yet.

    public class TrickyMove
extends Move
    Create an object manipulating a tricky move.
    It enables the use of a move in the non standard playing stream. It happens when an opponent attacks you through a hazard and you have the correspondent safety card.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Simon RENOULT

      • targetIsCompatible

        public boolean targetIsCompatible(Player targetPlayer)
                           throws IllegalMoveException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: Move
        Perform a verification on target player. As the verification content depends on the type of move, the method is set as abstract and is used through a final method : Move.setTarget(Player).
        Specified by:
        targetIsCompatible in class Move
        Returns:
        True if the target is compatible , else false.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException
